snippet: Five suspended employees of a Tulsa megachurch who were accused of waiting more than two weeks to report rape allegations by a 13-year-old girl will return to the ministry.
abstract: Five suspended employees of Victory Christian Center in Tulsa, Okla, who were accused of waiting more than two weeks to report rape allegations by a 13-year-old girl will return to the ministry with different responsibilities.
lead_paragraph: Five suspended employees of a Tulsa megachurch who were accused of waiting more than two weeks to report rape allegations by a 13-year-old girl will return to the ministry.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Suspended Church Workers Will Return
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Suspended Church Workers Will Return
